name: Lone elven wanderer
description:
Lone elven wanderer is a 2D platformer with roguelike elements. You have to go on an incredible adventure through different worlds in search of gold, jewels and fame.

Explore amazing worlds, arm yourself with only the best weapons that the inhabitants of a small village can provide you. Fight various opponents that await you in an endless and incredible adventure.

Game Features:
- Various difficulty levels
- Various locations
- Constantly changing gameplay
- Pleasant music
